global_prompt: African American muscular male superhero, urban streetwear (hooded jacket, cargo pants, high-top sneakers, subtle armored details), glowing aura like graffiti/neon sparks, gritty New York alley atmosphere at night, cinematic realism.

items.prompt: Wide shot of a dark New York alley behind a brick building, trash bins, graffiti, and a flickering neon sign.
Medium shot: the superhero enters the alley, hood up, walking confidently.
